ComicInfo.Title: Threat Matrix Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary:
THREAT MATRIX CONCLUDES! It's DUKE versus MAD MONK for all the marbles! 'Nuff said! (Wait. Wrong company.)
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Steve Kurth (p), Allen Martinez (i) & Koana LaFuente (c) | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Ryan Dunlavey | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 12:33:10. [CVDB433198]
